title: The chemistry of fermented coffee
description: Human "sniffers" described the flavor as "raspberry notes with a hint of rose water."

title: AT&T tries to block Starlink/T-Mobile plan for satellite-to-phone service
description: AT&T and rural telcos say Starlink-fueled phone service would cause interference.

title: One more dead in horrific eye drop outbreak that now spans 18 states
description: Bacteria in the recalled drops are so drug-resistant, docs turn to phage therapy.

title: Willow and many other shows will be removed from Disney+, Hulu
description: A reckoning is underway for the economics of streaming services.

title: SanDisk Extreme SSDs keep abruptly failing—firmware fix for only some promised
description: Ars saw two 2TB units become unreadable, but SanDisk only confirms 4TB troubles.

title: It took 48 hours, but the mystery of the mass Asus router outage is solved
description: Asus finally responds after being castigated by users.

title: Weird AliExpress laptop with Intel 8088 CPU will take you back to the MS-DOS era
description: "Book 8088 DOS" laptop promises a real-deal MS-DOS experience.

title: Newly discovered exoplanet could have liquid water, lots of volcanoes
description: The likely volcanoes should ensure that it has an atmosphere, too.

title: Twitter claims Microsoft broke API rules; Musk already threatened lawsuit
description: Twitter demands Microsoft audit a month after Musk declared, "Lawsuit time."

title: TikTokers immediately sue to block Montana’s “unconstitutional” ban
description: TikTokers can't “imagine America without" the app, sue Montana to block ban.

title: Samsung backs down from its threat to switch its Android phones to Bing
description: Samsung and Google's contract dispute comes to an end, as usual, in favor of Google.

title: Once again, NASA leans into the future by picking an innovative lunar lander
description: “It’s an incredible moment in spaceflight history."

title: How “nazi glorification” became one of Garry’s Mod’s few prohibited acts
description: Creator says being a parent has made his moderation attitudes "less black and white."

title: Fearing leaks, Apple restricts its employees from using ChatGPT and AI tools
description: Cloud AI tools could leak confidential Apple company data; Apple works on its own LLM.

title: Kia and Hyundai agree to $200M settlement for making cars viral theft targets
description: 2011-2022 model owners may be paid for damages, towing, rentals, other costs.

title: Don’t get an epidural in Mexico, CDC warns—40 dead, including 1 Texan
description: The current outbreak echoes one reported last year from a different Mexican state.

title: Many of world’s biggest lakes in peril due to warming, drying climate
description: A new global study shows water levels falling and finds a global warming fingerprint.

title: Lexus’ 2023 RZ 450e disappoints, offering poor EV range and a bumpy ride
description: Toyota's luxury brand must try harder if it wants to sell a million EVs by 2030.

title: Rocket Report: Canada places premium on a spaceport, Lueders heads to Starbase
description: "I fell to my knees, sobbing, from witnessing such an incredible feat."

title: Dealmaster: Save on Dell XPS 15, smartwatches, and more
description: Summer is here, but that shouldn't keep you from your cable management project.

title: Potentially millions of Android TVs and phones come with malware preinstalled
description: The bane of low-cost Android devices is showing no signs of going away.
